p: A total of 99 articles with 130 records and a sample size of 924,516 reported HCV prevalence in PWID and FSWs. A total of 76 papers with 101 records had been conducted on PWID and 24 papers with 29 records on FSWs. The overall prevalence of HCV in PWID and FSWs was 60% (95% CI: 55–64%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 99.54%) and 1% (95% CI: 1–2%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 97.04%), respectively ( Supplementary Figures S3 and S4, Table 2).
